verses.verse: שׁוֹטְט֞וּ <S%H7751><s%> Run ye to and fro בְּחוּצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> through the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וּרְאוּ־ <S%H7200><s%> and see נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now וּדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> now and know וּבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> and seek בִרְחוֹבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H7339><s%> in the broad places אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּמְצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> thereof if ye can find אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֵ֛שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if there be עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [any] that executeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> that seeketh אֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> the truth וְאֶסְלַ֖ח <S%H5545><s%> and I will pardon לָֽהּ׃

וְאִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> and although חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יֹאמֵ֑רוּ <S%H559><s%> And though they say לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely יִשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> surely they swear

יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עֵינֶיךָ֮ <S%H5869><s%> [are] not thine eyes הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לֶאֱמוּנָה֒ <S%H530><s%> faithfulness הִכִּ֤יתָה <S%H5221><s%> beat אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not חָ֔לוּ <S%H2342><s%> them but they have not grieved כִּלִּיתָ֕ם <S%H3615><s%> thou hast consumed מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> them [but] they have refused קַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> to receive מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> correction חִזְּק֤וּ <S%H2388><s%> harder פְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> they have made their faces מִסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> than a rock מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> they have refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> to return

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֔רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Therefore I said אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> are only דַּלִּ֖ים <S%H1800><s%> Surely these [are] poor הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> They נוֹאֲל֕וּ <S%H2973><s%> they are foolish כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> for they know דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> [nor] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> of their God

אֵֽלֲכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> will go לִּ֤י אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגְּדֹלִים֙ <S%H1419><s%> me unto the great men וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <S%H1696><s%> and will speak אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יָדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> unto them for they have known דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> [and] the judgment אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> of their God אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> also הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> with יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> but these have altogether שָׁ֣בְרוּ <S%H7665><s%> broken עֹ֔ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke נִתְּק֖וּ <S%H5423><s%> [and] burst מוֹסֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4147><s%> the bonds

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֩ <S%H3651><s%> after that הִכָּ֨ם <S%H5221><s%> shall slay אַרְיֵ֜ה <S%H738><s%> Wherefore a lion מִיַּ֗עַר <S%H3293><s%> out of the forest זְאֵ֤ב <S%H2061><s%> them [and] a wolf עֲרָבוֹת֙ <S%H6160><s%> of the evenings יְשָׁדְדֵ֔ם <S%H7703><s%> shall spoil נָמֵ֤ר <S%H5246><s%> them a leopard שֹׁקֵד֙ <S%H8245><s%> shall watch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> over their cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone הַיּוֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> every one that goeth out מֵהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> thence shall יִטָּרֵ֑ף <S%H2963><s%> be torn in pieces כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because רַבּוּ֙ <S%H7231><s%> are many פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> because their transgressions עָצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> are increased [מְשֻׁבֹותֵיהֶם כ] (מְשׁוּבֹותֵיהֶֽם <S%H4878><s%> backsliding ק)

אֵ֤י <S%H335><s%> How לָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise [אֶסְלֹוחַ־ כ] (אֶֽסְלַֽח־ <S%H5545><s%> pardon לָ֔ךְ <S%H5545><s%> shall I pardon ק) בָּנַ֣יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> your sons עֲזָב֔וּנִי <S%H5800><s%> have forsaken וַיִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <S%H7650><s%> me and sworn בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> by [them that are] no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> gods וָאַשְׂבִּ֤עַ <S%H7650><s%> when I had fed them to the full אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּנְאָ֔פוּ <S%H5003><s%> they then committed adultery וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> houses זוֹנָ֖ה <S%H2181><s%> in the harlots' יִתְגֹּדָֽדוּ׃ <S%H1413><s%> and assembled themselves by troops

סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> horses מְיֻזָּנִ֖ים <S%H2109><s%> They were [as] fed מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <S%H7904><s%> in the morning הָי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> after אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> after his neighbour's יִצְהָֽלוּ׃ <S%H6670><s%> neighed

הַֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> Shall I not visit נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> for these [things]? saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> and on בְּג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> such כָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> and shall not my soul ס

עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> Go ye up בְשָׁרוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8284><s%> upon her walls וְשַׁחֵ֔תוּ <S%H7843><s%> and destroy וְכָלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> not a full end אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> but make הָסִ֙ירוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> take away נְטִ֣ישׁוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5189><s%> her battlements כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> are not לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for they [are] not the LORD'S הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for בָג֨וֹד <S%H898><s%> have dealt very בָּגְד֜וּ <S%H898><s%> treacherously בִּ֗י בֵּ֧ית <S%H1004><s%> For the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> against me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּֽחֲשׁוּ֙ <S%H3584><s%> They have belied בַּיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> come עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> [It is] not he neither shall evil וְחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword וְרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> nor famine ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> and we will not נִרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> upon us neither shall we see

וְהַנְּבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> And the prophets יִֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> shall become wind וְהַדִּבֵּ֖ר <S%H1699><s%> and the word אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else בָּהֶ֑ם כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [is] not in them thus shall it be done לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Wherefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because דַּבֶּרְכֶ֔ם <S%H1696><s%> Because ye speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵן֩ <S%H5414><s%> behold I will make דְּבָרַ֨י <S%H1697><s%> my words בְּפִ֜יךָ <S%H6310><s%> in thy mouth לְאֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and this people הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> and this עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> wood וַאֲכָלָֽתַם׃ <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִיא֩ <S%H935><s%> Lo I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> against גּ֧וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation מִמֶּרְחָ֛ק <S%H4801><s%> upon you from far בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גּ֣וֹי ׀ <S%H1471><s%> nation אֵיתָ֣ן <S%H386><s%> it [is] a mighty ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גּ֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation מֵעוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> it [is] an ancient ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גּ֚וֹי <S%H1471><s%> a nation לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תֵדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest לְשֹׁנ֔וֹ <S%H3956><s%> whose language וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> not neither understandest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> what they say
אַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <S%H827><s%> Their quiver כְּקֶ֣בֶר <S%H6913><s%> sepulchre פָּת֑וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> [is] as an open כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> All גִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> they [are] all mighty men

וְאָכַ֨ל <S%H398><s%> And they shall eat up קְצִֽירְךָ֜ <S%H7105><s%> thine harvest וְלַחְמֶ֗ךָ <S%H3899><s%> and thy bread יֹאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> should eat בָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> [which] thy sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters יֹאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> they shall eat up צֹאנְךָ֙ <S%H6629><s%> thy flocks וּבְקָרֶ֔ךָ <S%H1241><s%> and thine herds יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> they shall eat up גַּפְנְךָ֖ <S%H1612><s%> thy vines וּתְאֵנָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8384><s%> and thy fig trees יְרֹשֵׁ֞שׁ <S%H7567><s%> they shall impoverish עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities מִבְצָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4013><s%> thy fenced אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you בּוֹטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> trustedst בָּהֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> wherein thou בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> even בַּיָּמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> Nevertheless in those days הָהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> I will not make אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for כָּלָֽה׃ <S%H3617><s%> a full end

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall come כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תֹאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And it shall come to pass when ye shall say תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash מֶ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> how long עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> doeth יְהֹוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> all these [things] unto us? then shalt thou answer אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to them עֲזַבְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5800><s%> them Like as ye have forsaken אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> וַתַּעַבְד֞וּ <S%H5647><s%> me and served אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> gods נֵכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> strange בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <S%H776><s%> in your land כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> so תַּעַבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> so shall ye serve זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> strangers בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in a land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לָכֶֽם׃ ס

הַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Declare זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> this in the house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְהַשְׁמִיע֥וּהָ <S%H8085><s%> and publish בִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> it in Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Now זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people סָכָ֖ל <S%H5530><s%> now this O foolish וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and without לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> and without understanding עֵינַ֤יִם <S%H5869><s%> which have eyes לָהֶם֙ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see אָזְנַ֥יִם <S%H241><s%> not which have ears לָהֶ֖ם וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> and hear

הַאוֹתִ֨י <S%H853><s%> לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תִירָ֜אוּ <S%H3372><s%> Fear נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ye not me? saith יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> at מִפָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> at my presence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot תָחִ֔ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> will ye not tremble אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֤מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> which have placed חוֹל֙ <S%H2344><s%> the sand גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> [for] the bound לַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> decree עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> by a perpetual וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעַבְרֶ֑נְהוּ <S%H5674><s%> that it cannot pass וַיִּֽתְגָּעֲשׁוּ֙ <S%H1607><s%> thereof toss וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יוּכָ֔לוּ <S%H3201><s%> themselves yet can they not prevail וְהָמ֥וּ <S%H1993><s%> though they roar גַלָּ֖יו <S%H1530><s%> it and though the waves וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעַבְרֻֽנְהוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> yet can they not pass over

וְלָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> But this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> has לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> heart סוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5637><s%> hath a revolting וּמוֹרֶ֑ה <S%H4784><s%> and a rebellious סָ֖רוּ <S%H5493><s%> they are revolted וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and departed

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Neither say בִלְבָבָ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> they in their heart נִ֤ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Let us now fear נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הַנֹּתֵ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> that giveth גֶּ֛שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain [וְיֹרֶה כ] (יֹורֶ֥ה <S%H3138><s%> autumn rain ק) וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> and the latter בְּעִתּ֑וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his season שְׁבֻע֛וֹת <S%H7620><s%> weeks חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> unto us the appointed קָצִ֖יר <S%H7105><s%> of the harvest יִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> he reserveth לָֽנוּ׃

עֲוֹנוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> Your iniquities הִטּוּ־ <S%H5186><s%> have turned away אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְחַטֹּ֣אותֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> these [things] and your sins מָנְע֥וּ <S%H4513><s%> have withholden הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good מִכֶּֽם׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> are found בְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> For among my people רְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked יָשׁוּר֙ <S%H7789><s%> [men] they lay wait כְּשַׁ֣ךְ <S%H7918><s%> as he that setteth יְקוּשִׁ֔ים <S%H3353><s%> snares הִצִּ֥יבוּ <S%H5324><s%> they set מַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H4889><s%> a trap אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> men יִלְכֹּֽדוּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> they catch

כִּכְלוּב֙ <S%H3619><s%> As a cage מָ֣לֵא <S%H4392><s%> is full ע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of birds כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> so [are] their houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <S%H4392><s%> full מִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4820><s%> of deceit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So גָּדְל֖וּ <S%H1431><s%> therefore they are become great וַֽיַּעֲשִֽׁירוּ׃ <S%H6238><s%> and waxen rich

שָׁמְנ֣וּ <S%H8080><s%> They are waxen fat עָשְׁת֗וּ <S%H6245><s%> they shine גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also עָֽבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> yea they overpass דִבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> the deeds רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> not the cause לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not דָ֔נוּ <S%H1777><s%> they judge דִּ֥ין <S%H1779><s%> the cause יָת֖וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the cause of the fatherless וְיַצְלִ֑יחוּ <S%H6743><s%> yet they prosper וּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> and the right אֶבְיוֹנִ֖ים <S%H34><s%> of the needy לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁפָֽטוּ׃ <S%H8199><s%> do they not judge

הַֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶפְקֹ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> Shall I not visit נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> for these [things]? saith יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> On בְּג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> such כָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> shall not my soul ס
שַׁמָּה֙ <S%H8047><s%> A wonderful וְשַׁ֣עֲרוּרָ֔ה <S%H8186><s%> and horrible thing נִהְיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> is committed בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

הַנְּבִיאִ֞ים <S%H5030><s%> The prophets נִבְּא֣וּ־ <S%H5012><s%> prophesy בַשֶּׁ֗קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests יִרְדּ֣וּ <S%H7287><s%> bear rule עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> by their means וְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> and my people אָ֣הֲבוּ <S%H157><s%> love כֵ֑ן <S%H3651><s%> so וּמַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> [to have it] so and what will ye do לְאַחֲרִיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H319><s%> in the end
